goal_name: A strong rural economy that creates opportunities, enables the development of rural communities and increasingly contributes to national prosperity
target_name: Deepen the integration of the tourism sector into the rural economy to spread opportunities to rural communities
indicator_name: Proportion of visitors traveling to outer islands
GoalDescription: A strong rural economy that creates opportunities, enables the development of rural communities and increasingly contributes to national prosperity
PolicyObjectiveDescription: Deepen the integration of the tourism sector into the rural economy to spread opportunities to rural communities
IndicatorDescription: Proportion of visitors traveling to outer islands
Calculation/Formulation: Total number of outer islands visitors divided by the total number of visitors arrivals from overseas.
ComputationMethod: (number of tourist visitors to the outer islands )/(total number of tourist visitors to vanuatu ) X100
Concept: Number of tourists visiting the outer islands of Vanuatu either for a day pass or spend the night apart from the total number of tourist’s visitors into the country.
DataSource:
* Tourism department
* Ministry of Trades
* Provincial government
Definition: Number of tourist travelling to outer islands in cooperative relation to the total number of tourist visitors into the country
IndicatorShortName: Tourism in Outer Islands as Proportion to Total
Rationale:
* Indicates the impacts of tourism in the economy.
* Depicts the development of the tourism sector in the outer islands and the rural communities.
